name: ROC MPM
main_text:
Our special MPM Building branch offers our unique “Digital” platform which enables customers to order their drinks online from their desk without the use of paper via Monpay application provided by Mobicom

It offers the perfect ambiance and brightness for work meetings and also includes a private room for 4-6 people for meetings and other work related purposes. Although the branch is located in an office, it can accommodate for both sit-in and take-away purposes for our customers.
address: Address: 1st Floor, MPM Building, Bayanzurkh District, Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia
